item.description:
Raw Food Meeup event
November 10, Saturday, at 1:00 PM

This event will be held at The Organic Garden: http://organicgardenc... at 294 Cabot Street, Beverly, MA. Phone is 978-922-0004.

Host will be either Daryl Elliott or the owner of The Organic Garden, Rawbert Reid.

There is a park on the ocean that we could visit after lunch if the weather is nice. Percy F. Lyons Park is only 6 blocks down Dane St. at the intersection of Dane St. and Lothrup St. To find it on a map, visit http://maps.google.co... and enter Percy F. Lyons Park, Beverly, MA or 111 Lothrup St., Beverly, MA.

No cost for the event beyond the cost for your food. Please request individual food tickets.
item.name: Boston Raw Food January Meetup
